SAINT.Name: Tuesday of the Third Week of Lent

TROPARION.Header: Troparion of the Prophecy in the 7th Tone

SEXTE.TROPARION: Our salvation art Thou, O Lord, and a defender in the day of affliction; have mercy on us according to Thy great mercy, O Lover of mankind.

PROKEIMENON.Header: First Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 4th Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: The Lord of Hosts is with us,
our helper is the God of Jacob.
SEXTE.STICHOS: Our God is refuge and strength.

PROKEIMENON.Header: Second Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 3rd Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: O chant unto the Lord, chant ye;
chant unto our King, chant ye.
SEXTE.STICHOS: Clap your hands, all ye nations; shout unto God with a voice of rejoicing.
